title: 103_s2128
content: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to authorize the Superintendent of the Grand Canyon National Park to: (1) charge and collect, in addition to the entrance fee, a surcharge in an amount not to exceed $2 for each individual charged such fee. And (2) remit the surcharge to the special account for the Grand Canyon National Park infrastructure improvement established by this Act. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the National Park Service, to use funds in the special account to pay the Federal share of the cost of eligible projects such as the design, construction, operation, maintenance, repair, or replacement of a facility within the Park that meets specified guidelines. Requires the Director to enter into a cost-sharing agreement with a non-Federal Government entity for each eligible project. Requires the Secretary to report to the Congress on the Park infrastructure improvement.
